titleInfo.title: S.E. De Tavernier in Careyville, Tennessee to O.P. Temple

subject.geographic: The Development of the Industrial United States (1870-1900).

mods.note: Informs Temple of the writer`s failure to secure for the recipient a maid, as there are none free, and those employed were dissuaded by their employees. Laments the general low quality in service. Discusses the presidential nomination, and expresses concern over the possible nomination of Arthur.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
